snippet: The editor of an influential Communist Party journal had called China’s alliance with North Korea “outdated” in an article for a British newspaper.
abstract: Deng Yuwen, well-known editor of Study Times, influential Communist Party journal, says that he has been suspended after writing article for British newspaper Financial Times saying that China should abandon its ally North Korea.
lead_paragraph: The editor of an influential Communist Party journal had called China’s alliance with North Korea “outdated” in an article for a British newspaper.

headline.seo: Penalty for Chinese Editor Critical of Korea Stance
headline.main: Chinese Editor Suspended for Article on North Korea
headline.print_headline: Chinese Editor Suspended For Article on North Korea
